name: ddev
description: Simple, and fast template for DiscordJS using TypeScript and Bun.

scripts.build: bun run bundles && bun run check && bun run ./scripts/prestart.ts && bun run scripts/build.ts
scripts.start: bun run check && bun run bundles && bun run scripts/prestart.ts && NODE_ENV=development bun run src/index.ts
